# ANCHOR:decisions
## Key Decisions Made

### D1: Timeline Correction (REF-002)
- **FROM:** 11 weeks estimated timeline
- **TO:** 6-7 weeks actual timeline
- **REASON:** Original estimate counted parallel workstreams sequentially and overestimated phase dependencies

### D2: Critical Path Correction (REF-003)
- **FROM:** 28 days critical path
- **TO:** ~17 days actual critical path
- **REASON:** Items 1-3 can overlap; Causal Graph (10 days) is true long pole

### D3: P0 Reclassification (REF-007)
- CHK-013, CHK-017, CHK-126 moved from P0 to P1
- **REASON:** These are aspirational metrics (25-35%, +20%, +40%), not functional blockers
- **RESULT:** P0 count reduced from 69 to 66

### D4: Evidence Framework Added (REF-006)
- Added Evidence Log section to checklist.md
- Created scratch/evidence/ directory
- **REASON:** 233 checklist items had no verification audit trail

### D5: HALT & Recovery Protocols Added (REF-004/005)
- Added HALT conditions table (6 conditions)
- Added Failure Recovery Protocol (4 severity levels)
- **REASON:** AI Execution Protocol was missing escalation guidance
